subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Amantle Montsho of Botswana tested positive for the banned stimulant methylhexaneamine after finishing fourth in the women’s 400-meter final.
snippet: Amantle Montsho of Botswana tested positive for the banned stimulant methylhexaneamine after finishing fourth in the women’s 400-meter final.
